titles.title: A concurrent resolution to correct technical errors in the enrollment of the bill H.R. 558.

action.text: Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 6/30/1987--Introduced. Makes corrections in the enrollment of H.R. 558 (Stewart B. McKinney Homeless Assistance Act) as it concerns food stamp program household determinations and annual standard deduction adjustments.
